column4: hello guys , i download calmav-0.88.4.tar.gz. then i use ./configure. but it tell me to install zlib and zlib-devel packages, then i download zlib_1.2.3.tar.gz and install that. then when i try to install again,this time i succeed but i can't use sudo freshclam it told me: ERROR: Please edit the example config file /usr/local/etc/freshclam.conf.
and ERROR: Please edit the example config file /usr/local/etc/clamd.conf.
and ERROR: Can't parse the config file /usr/local/etc/clamd.conf
Um, just 'apt-get install' it.
Whya r you mucking about with tarballs?
apt-get only can get clamav 0.88.2
and...?
i install it
Works fine here.
it prints two warninsg that you cna ignore, but it works fine.
really? the warning is normal?
Yes.
but now i'm in 0.88.4 can u give me any suggestion?
Remove 0.88.4 completely. Just run the packaged one and let it run the freshclam server normally.
i done , it give me 3 errors:ERROR: Please edit the example config file /usr/local/etc/freshclam.conf.
That is not the Ubuntu 0.88.2 version.
I mean not the version that is packaged in Ubuntu; it's trying to run the one you installed by hand from the tarball.
Yes
That's the thing with tarball stuff, you can't easily uninstall it. that's why you don't install it unless you have no choice.
please give me some suggestion :<
thx
